name: Monastery
description: A sacred site of worship and reflection; adventurers might receive blessings, research lore, or clash with zealots.
atmosphere: The monastery has a peaceful, contemplative atmosphere with the scent of incense and the sound of monks chanting prayers. The air carries the weight of spiritual devotion and the mysteries of religious life, while the atmosphere crackles with the energy of divine connection and the pursuit of spiritual enlightenment.
